description:
After Sousuke blows up his shoe locker, a strange letter is found in the rubble. Later, Kaname is kidnapped by a gang of high school punks!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`homme venu du sud / Un otage sans compromis
L`uomo venuto dal sud / Hostage senza negoziati
Minami kara Kita Otoko / Dakyou Muyou no Hostage
O Homem Que Veio Do Sul! - Um Refém Sem Compromissos!
The Man from the South / A Hostage with No Compromises
南から来た男 / 妥協無用のホステージ
